touch screen driver how to
[HOWTO] 

qt2160 touch screen driver is a standard keypad driver
  device node: /dev/event0

FAQ:
  1.How to detect touch screen device?

    if (open("/dev/event0", O_RDONLY) < 0){
      printf("Can't detect touch screen\n");
     return EXIT_FAILURE;
    }


  2.How to auto-detect availablility of the touch-screen or the M4-keypad ?

    touch-screen driver and M4-keypad driver have the same device node:/dev/event0.
    But they have different name,it can read from "/sys/class/input/event0/device/name".
    So It is possible to detect distinguish between the M4 keypad and the 
    touch-screen through read /sys/class/input/event0/device/name.
    
    touch-screen info:
    [root@NEWLAND_CIT /]cat /sys/class/input/event0/device/name 
    AT42QT2160 Touch Sense Keyboard CIT200 version

    M4 Keypad info:
    [root@NEWLAND_CIT /]cat /sys/class/input/event0/device/name 
    Newland Academe Keypad
